Notes sobre el Servidor de CRTM

Cambiamos el valor ResultSetMaxRows (10000 -> 20000)
Multiplicamos el NumberOfBuffers (10000 -> 100000 -> 20000) y MaxDirtyBuffers (6000 -> 60000 -> 120000) para permitir subir muchos datos
Timezone issue TimezonelessDatetimes (en progresso)
To obtain uploaded files: SELECT ll_file, ll_state, ll_started, ll_done, ll_work_time, ll_error FROM DB.DBA.load_list WHERE ll_state = 2;
speaker: SYSTEM
